name: Library Bag and Fabric Dye Markers Set
description:
Let your kids get creative by designing their own library bag. They will always know which bag is theirs and if just starting school it will add to excitement of borrowing their favourite stories to take home.

Pack contents:

1 100% Cotton White Carry Bag with 2 Handles
1 6pk FabricMate Fabric Dye Felt Tip Markers

name: Pillow Cases and Fabric Dye Markers Set
description:
Let your kids create a cosy inviting place to lay their heads. Using the fabric dye felt tip markers they can draw on these white pillow cases and make them their own. Great for sleep overs, gifts, and can even be used to make a hospital stay that little bit more personal by using their own pillows. The pack of six markers come in Fluro colours to brighten up their space.

Pack contains:
2 100% Cotton Plain White Standard Pillow Cases
1 Pack of 6 Fruro Coloured FabricMate Fabric Dye Felt Tip Markers

name: Tea Towels and Fabric Dye Markers Set
description:
Tea Towels to have your children use their imagination to draw on with the fabric dye felt tip pens included. Personalise your kitchen. Great for gifts at Christmas time, Mothers' Day, housewarmings and everyday use as a way to display your child's art.

Pack contains:
3 100% White Cotton Tea Towels 
1 pack of 6 Fluro coloured FabricMate fabric dye felt tip markers
